turns.text: Well I dont know if theres going to be solutions to the budget

-- it might have to be something that they might consider doing as shir- thats got to be very short term

And the only other avenue that I can think of is uh looking at where theyre spending the money and not so much as saying well were spending too much in that area as perhaps looking at what is costing them the money As --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- for for instance I think you probably remember the military getting caught um with toilet seats that cost them four hundred five hundred dollars

-- probably lot of waste in defense and in government funded research in the first place
